item.title: Convert Web Pages to Ebooks in MOBI Format using Wget and Calibre
item.description: This article will walk you through how to convert web pages to ebooks in MOBI format using two tools: Wget and Calibre.

item.title: Unlock the Power of ImageMagick: A Beginner's Guide to Image Processing
item.description: ImageMagick is a powerful open-source tool for image processing. This tutorial covers the basic commands for image conversion, resizing, cropping, rotating, and adding effects. Learn how to manipulate your images with this tutorial.

item.title: Python Number Formatting Made Easy with f-Strings
item.description: Learn how to format numbers in Python with f-strings. Use format_spec to specify width, alignment, scientific notation, and more.

item.title: AI Ethics, Advancements, and Limitations: An Interview with ChatGPT
item.description: An interview with ChatGPT, I conducted on March 30th 2023, asking about GPT, creating language models, artificial and human intelligence, potential benefits and risks of AI, ethical considerations, and predictions for the future.
